synth.name: Microfreak

steps: Use the <synth-knob>Type</synth-knob> knob to select “Sample”, “Scan Grains”, “Cloud Grains”, or “Hit Grains”
Hold down <synth-button>Shift</synth-button>, then rotate <synth-knob>Type</synth-knob> to bring up the sample menu
Hold down <synth-button>Shift</synth-button>, then rotate <synth-knob>Type</synth-knob> to exit this mode

steps.step: The <synth-button>Mode</synth-button> controls what the Cycling Envelope does:
details: Acts as an LFO that is triggered and restarted by Gate/Key events

steps: Hold <synth-button>Shift</synth-button> and turn <synth-knob>Rise</synth-knob> to adjust the shape of attack
Hold <synth-button>Shift</synth-button> and turn <synth-knob>Fall</synth-knob> to adjust the shape of decay
Hold down one of the <synth-button>Assign</synth-button> buttons
Turn the <synth-knob>Matrix</synth-knob> to select the modulation point to modulation
Hold down one of the <synth-button>Assign</synth-button> buttons

Unison.notes: Make sure your preset is saved before doing this, just in case you mess it up

notes: Sequencer is omitted since I don't use it
